PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ZoneCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcZone.

PropertyDef.Name: GrossPlannedArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Total planned gross area for the zone. Used for programming the zone.

PropertyDef.Name: HandicapAccessible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as an accessible space for handicapped people, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE). This information is often used to declare the need for access for the disabled and for special design requirements of this space.

PropertyDef.Name: IsExternal
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external zone at the outside of the building.

PropertyDef.Name: NetPlannedArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Total planned net area for the zone. Used for programming the zone.

PropertyDef.Name: PubliclyAccessible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as a publicly accessible space, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'). Used to store the non-classification driven internal project type.
